title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: World Trade Center
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Bryan Curtis discuss Oliver Stone's World Trade Center, starring Nicholas Cage. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
